BSX Exchange Python SDKÔÉÅ

This is the Python SDK for the BSX Exchange API.

The latest version of the SDK can be found on PyPI, and the source code is on GitHub.

Note

üëã Brand new to BSX?

  1. Join the BSX community via Discord, Twitter.

  2. Read our docs to learn the basic concepts.

  3. Visit us at BSX Exchange.

  4. Take a look at the Getting started section. It will give you a quick idea of the things you can do via the SDK!

RequirementsÔÉÅ

  • Python 3.9 or above

InstallationÔÉÅ

Via pip:

pip install bsx-sdk-py

You might want to use a virtual environment to isolate your packages.
